entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Castlegar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 0.0°C

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 4.
